sections.title: New
items: Added Ranked mode with seasonal resets and visible MMR
New competitive leaderboard that updates every 5 minutes
New map: Rustyard (industrial theme with dynamic lighting)
Added pre-match warmup phase in public servers
New lobby music track (temporary placeholder)
Added detailed end-of-round statistics screen
Players can now inspect other playersâ€™ loadouts in lobby
FS won't be available until next update :(
New experimental matchmaking logic enabled for 10% of servers
Added in-game patch notes viewer (this screen)

sections.title: Fixes
items: Fixed shop opening twice when interacting quickly
Fixed rare case where UI would duplicate on respawn
Fixed lag spikes caused by excessive Tween creation
Fixed memory leak related to uncleaned connections
Resolved issue where characters could clip through doors
Fixed incorrect hit detection on sloped surfaces
Fixed broken animations when joining mid-round
Patched server error spam related to nil humanoids
Fixed leaderboard not updating after round end
Resolved rare crash when loading large maps

sections.title: Changes
items: Adjusted movement speed for better consistency across devices
Rebalanced stamina drain to discourage infinite sprinting
Reduced round start delay from 10s to 6s
Increased server cleanup frequency to improve performance
Updated UI font sizes for better readability
Improved camera smoothing when spectating
Reworked interaction prompts to be more responsive
Adjusted audio levels to reduce clipping
Changed default FOV slightly to reduce motion sickness

sections.title: Known Issues
items: Some cosmetics may not load correctly on first join
Occasional delay when opening menus on low-end devices
Rare desync issues in high-ping servers
Spectator camera may briefly snap on round transition
Lighting may flicker on older GPUs
Certain animations may fail to preload on first join
FS features are disabled until the next major update

sections.title: Experimental
items: Testing new server-side caching system
Evaluating alternative replication strategy for abilities
Early groundwork for future mod support
Testing UI virtualization for large lists
Internal rewrite of round flow logic (not fully enabled)
Collecting performance metrics for next optimization pass
Experimental anti-exploit checks (false positives possible)

sections.title: Developer Notes
items: This update focuses on stability and infrastructure
Large content drops are planned for future releases
Ranked mode will receive frequent balance updates
Some systems are intentionally overbuilt for future features
Feedback from recent playtests heavily influenced this patch
Expect more frequent hotfixes moving forward
Thank you for testing and reporting issues
